snippet: A suit by a conservative historian against Rebecca Bell-Metereau and Judy Jennings for a satirical YouTube video is a test of tort reform intended to protect free speech.
lead_paragraph: A suit by a conservative historian against Rebecca Bell-Metereau and Judy Jennings for a satirical YouTube video is a test of tort reform intended to protect free speech.

headline.seo: David Barton’s Defamation Lawsuit Tests New Texas Law
headline.main: Defamation Suit Puts New Law to the Test
headline.print_headline: Defamation Suit Puts New Law to the Test
